p: B-cell epitopes within each ORF of isolates DENV 2SS, 43,248, 43,253, 43,254, and KBPV-VR29 were predicted using the BCPreds prediction tool [ 33]. The putative epitopes were further evaluated using the VaxiJen server (antigenicity prediction server). Regions with BCPreds scores of > 0.8 and VaxiJen scores of > 0.6 were identified as probable B-cell epitopes.
